basics.name: Mudassir Ali
basics.label: Senior Frontend Engineer
basics.summary:
Web developer with specialization in Frontend Technologies. Has good sense of UI and UX design. Loves coding in Javascript and Ruby.
Familiar with BackboneJS, EmberJS, AngularJS, Ruby on Rails, AWS Opsworks, Selenium (Python).

work.summary: Primarily responsible for architecting and building the frontend web application written in AngularJS.
highlights: Building the frontend application using AngularJS
Setup the build process to optimize scripts & css files using Grunt
Setup karma to have a unit test suite to have maximum code coverage
Regularly gets involved in UX design
Designed and implemented the landing page of the website

work.summary: Delivered new features as a senior frontend engineer on their flagship product Recruiterbox, an ATS to manage job applications.
highlights: Working primarily on BackboneJS, developed reusable user interface components.
Gets involved in UI & UX design.
Wrote [shell scripts & grunt tasks](https://github.com/Aplopio/email-friendly-templates) to automate certain build processes.
Refactored code and wrote selenium test cases in python.

work.summary: Worked as a full stack web developer for the client PrimeRevenue on their products SCiCustomer & SCiMap.
highlights: Translated business requirements provided by marketing into customer facing UI designs.
Implemented upgrades, patches, code releases & database changes.
Did oversee unit testing, code reviews, debugging and documentation efforts.

work.summary: Worked as a full stack web developer & [designer](https://dribbble.com/mudassir0909/projects/401107-Foodraft) during my free time on various technologies such as Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, LESS & AWS Opsworks.
highlights: Implemented the JSON REST API using Ruby on Rails
Implemented user authentication using devise gem
Integrated Payment Gateway, transactional email & SMS using APIs
Involved in the responsive web design of the website right from picking the right color palette to designing the UI & UX to make the flow as intuitive as possible
Setup the development & production build process using Grunt
Deployed the web application on AWS Opsworks
Built an admin application to perform all the CRUD operations using Ruby on Rails & AngularJS
Built a vendor application that makes life easier for suppliers/vendors by letting them track & analyze the data using Ruby on Rails & AngularJS

work.summary: I'm one of the core contributors of Json Resume, an open source initiative to create a JSON-based standard for resumes.
highlights: Developed a responsive theme [Elegant](https://github.com/mudassir0909/jsonresume-theme-elegant), which won the [competition held in November 2014](https://github.com/mudassir0909/jsonresume-theme-elegant/issues/22) for the best theme.
Wrote a node module [theme-utils](https://github.com/jsonresume/theme-utils) which provides a useful set of methods for jsonresume theme developers to build themes faster.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Sciences, Pilani
